revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR841ND |revision=v8.x |series=N300 |asin= |fcc_date=08/09/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR841NXV8 |ic_id=8853A-WR841NXV8 |pcb_id=1110212841-8.0 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN25Q32B-104HIP |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JH-5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR841ND Support page]
"1110212841-8.0" and "Rev:1.0sp2" is silkscreened on the board :in the FCC photos (OEM: [[Proware]]).
Per the manual, the default SSID pattern is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' :(last three octets of the BSSID, presumably upper case hex letters).
===Wikis=== *[http://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr841nd ''TP-LINK TL-WR841ND'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-db120 ''TP-LINK TL-DB120'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :The China only version appears to have 2MB Flash and 16MB RAM.
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=31156 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :The router appears to be sold under the ''Fastcom'' brand as the FW300R v3.. :and under the ''Mercury'' brand as the MW300R.
{{see also|Mercury MW300R v3.x}}
